banner_instructions.instruction: YOU MUST start EVERY response with EXACTLY these banner lines at the top, with no introduction or explanation:

available_instructions.title: Cursor rules are user provided instructions for the AI to follow to help work with the codebase.
available_instructions.description: They may or may not be relevant to the task at hand. If they are, use the fetch_rules tool to fetch the full rule.
available_instructions.note: Some rules may be automatically attached to the conversation if the user attaches a file that matches the rule's glob, and won't need to be fetched.
